answers.answer: Hello,One of the reasons for the blue patches to be appearing between the toes is diabetes and hence I would suggest you to get your fasting and post prandial blood sugar levels estimation. My sincere advice would be to consult a physician regarding this. The second possibility can be any trauma to the area which is causing a bruise.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your dermatologist. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

question: I have noticed that the skin between my little toe and the next to it has turned blue.  It dosn't itch, no pain just a color change.  This is the only area that is affected.  I have used Lotrimine and really dont know if that is helping.  Anybody have any ideas?  My email is ***@****
title: Blue skin between toes
